title: PLEASE HELP ME IDENTIFY THE FONT FAMIY IN THS IMAGE
content:
please identify the font family in the attached image

Font: 

 Century Gothic 

Solved By:

comments.content:
Based on the light weight J that is on the baseline, not below, this is not Futura, so I agree with Ryuk.

- Mike Yanega
